channel.title: Hono on Cloudflare Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Hono on Cloudflare Docs

item.title: Create a fine-tuned OpenAI model with R2
item.description: Create a fine-tuned OpenAI model with R2 Last reviewed: June 7, 2024 In this tutorial, you will use the OpenAI External link icon Open external link API and Cloudflare R2 to create a fine-tuned model External link icon Open external link .

item.title: Build a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) AI
item.description: Build a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) AI Last reviewed: September 25, 2023 This guide will instruct you through setting up and deploying your first application with Cloudflare AI. You will build a fully-featured AI-powered application, using tools like Workers AI, Vectorize, D1, and Cloudflare Workers.

item.title: Recommend products on e-commerce sites using Workers AI and Stripe
item.description: Recommend products on e-commerce sites using Workers AI and Stripe Last reviewed: June 24, 2024 Developer Spotlight community contribution Written by: Hidetaka Okamoto Profile: LinkedIn External link icon Open external link E-commerce and media sites often work on increasing the average transaction value to boost profitability.

item.title: Query D1 from Hono
item.description: Query D1 from the Hono web framework

item.title: Build a Comments API
item.description: Build a Comments API Last reviewed: November 23, 2022 In this tutorial, you will learn how to use D1 to add comments to a static blog site. To do this, you will construct a new D1 database, and build a JSON API that allows the creation and retrieval of comments.

item.title: Build a Slackbot
item.description: Build a Slackbot Last reviewed: June 5, 2024 In this tutorial, you will build a Slack External link icon Open external link bot using Cloudflare Workers. Your bot will make use of GitHub webhooks to send messages to a Slack channel when issues are updated or created, and allow users to write a command to look up GitHub issues from inside Slack.

item.title: Build a Staff Directory Application
item.description: Build a Staff Directory with D1, Cloudflare Pages and HonoX Last reviewed: March 21, 2024 In this tutorial, you will learn how to use D1 to build a staff directory.

item.title: Create a serverless, globally distributed REST API with Fauna
item.description: Create a serverless, globally distributed REST API with Fauna Last reviewed: September 13, 2023 In this tutorial, you learn how to store and retrieve data in your Cloudflare Workers applications by building a REST API that manages an inventory catalog using Fauna External link icon Open external link as its data layer.

item.title: Hono
item.description: Hono Hono External link icon Open external link is a small, simple, and ultrafast web framework for Cloudflare Pages and Workers, Deno, and Bun. In this guide, you will create a new Hono application and deploy it using Cloudflare Pages.
